user-cookings works!

  • {{cooking.title}} - {{cooking.price}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ICooking } from '../ICooking'; import { CookingService } from '../cooking.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-cookings', templateUrl: './user-cookings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-cookings.component.css'] }) export class UserCookingsComponent implements OnInit { cookings: ICooking[] = []; constructor (private cookingService: CookingService) {} ngOnInit() : void { this.getCookings(); } getCookings(): void { this.cookingService.getAllCookings().subscribe(cooks => this.cookings = cooks); } }
